subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: The Medium sized project is an extension of the PDFA which aims to build capacity for Sustainable Land Management in Sierra Leone by the removal of the key barriers to sustainable land management practices while at the same time mainstreaming SLM into laws, university and school curricula and in budgets  through an Investment Plan and Regulatory Frameworks. Buildig sustainable capacity and promoting national ownership will help  to mitigate land degradation and thereby meet the country’s obligations under the United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification.
subproject.title: PIMS 3391 -LD -PDFA -SLM/CB
